ticket.title: Add lazy load hooks for all frameworks
ticket.original-body: Currently `ActiveSupport` has lazy load hooks for `action_view, action_controller, action_mailer, active_record`. I see no reason why all of the frameworks shouldn't have lazy load hooks. Hooks I think should be added: `action_dispatch, active_model, active_resource`.
